page.title: 11Sport.Tennis and Badminton.
page.content: Belford Tennis Club restarted in 1983 and had a membership of 92 by the end of the season.Through their own fund raising efforts and with financial aid from the C.C.P.R. and Berwick Borough Council,the members have set up 2 hard and 2 grass courts (one of which is also used for 5_a_side football) in the grounds of the Middle School. Junior members have performed creditably in the County Tournaments and 4 juniors have attended winter coaching sessions in Washington_a round trip of 110 miles. Belford Badminton Club was formed in 1951.Meetings are held in the First School and the Ferguson Hall.They have 3 teams in the Berwick League,and last season each team was the runner_up in their respective divisions.A Belford team has also won the Alnwick League twice in the last 3 years.
